mapper.sql: select id, carrier_id, carrier_code, order_number, bill_of_lading, business_unit, consignee, container_number, expired_dem, empty_container_depot, det_free_time, secure_code, release_date, vessel, vessel_no , voy_no, sztp, status, release_status, create_source, remark, del_flg, create_by, file_create_time, create_time, update_by, update_time, transaction_id from edo
mapper.insert:
select seq_edo.nextval as id from DUAL
insert into edo
id, carrier_id, carrier_code, order_number, bill_of_lading, business_unit, consignee, container_number, expired_dem, empty_container_depot, det_free_time, secure_code, release_date, vessel, vessel_no, voy_no, sztp, status, release_status, create_source, transaction_id, remark, del_flg, create_by, file_create_time, create_time
#{id}, #{carrierId}, #{carrierCode}, #{orderNumber}, #{billOfLading}, #{businessUnit}, #{consignee}, #{containerNumber}, #{expiredDem}, #{emptyContainerDepot}, #{detFreeTime}, #{secureCode}, #{releaseDate}, #{vessel}, #{vesselNo}, #{voyNo}, #{sztp}, #{status}, #{releaseStatus}, #{createSource}, #{transactionId}, #{remark}, #{delFlg}, #{createBy}, #{fileCreateTime}, sysdate
mapper.delete:
delete from edo where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select carrier_code from edo where bill_of_lading = #{blNo} group by carrier_code
select count(*) from edo where bill_of_lading = #{blNo} group by bill_of_lading
select distinct voy_no from edo where voy_no like concat(concat('%', #{keyString}), '%')
select distinct carrier_code from edo where carrier_code like concat(concat('%', #{keyString}), '%')
select distinct vessel_no from edo where vessel_no like concat(concat('%', #{keyString}), '%')
select distinct vessel from edo where vessel like concat(concat('%', #{keyString}), '%')
